title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local LLMs with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same feature parity as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama for chains, agents, retrieval, and tool usage.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, and embedding helpers; Maven Central available.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair-programmer.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop GUI for Ollama with chat history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-driven interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy model search, conversation threads, and plugins.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaler.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) with multi-arch support and CUDA runtime baked in.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with your documents.

title: modelfiles
summary: Curated collection of community Modelfiles for quantizing and running custom LLMs in Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n node to call Ollama chat/completions inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection friendly clients.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify integration enabling Ollama models as chat, completion, and embedding providers in the Dify LLM platform.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Open PR/discussion for pulling models directly from Hugging Face Hub into Ollama via hf:// shorthand.
